comment.author: 91829349@N00
comment._content: "Bride" was the daughter of Kaiser Wilhelm. They were married in May 1913: www.thepeerage.com/p10120.htm

comment.author: 35277872@N05
comment._content: rjones0856:  Thanks for the information and date.  The original photograph that was copied by the Nain News Service was copyrighted in 1913 by Sandau of Berlin.  We can add that information to the description when we update it.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
LOC -- in the original "auf Deutsch" caption to this photo, the prince's name is spelled "August," not "Auguste."

Brett -- you have inadvertently spelled "Bain" as "Nain".

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content:
Wystan,

Thanks for your comment. We will be updating the record to reflect that this couple should be identified as Ernst August and Viktoria Luise.

comment.author: 23737277@N07
comment._content:
Prince Ernst August III and Princess Victoria Luise were such a beautiful couple.I am
amazed at how very beautiful Princess Victoria Luise is and how very much Queen Sophie of Spain look alike. Wasn't  that her great grandmother?
